title: (x) Grace Church School / The Packer Collegiate Institute - Triplex / Palatino {Dav}
content:
Hi all,  
Can anyone ID:

“Grace Church School”  
 [http://www.gcschool.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111165747/http:/www.gcschool.org/)

“The Packer Collegiiate Institute”  
 [http://www.packer.edu/](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111165747/http:/www.packer.edu/)

-Will
author: winglets747

comments.content: Very sophisticated, Dav — links to online showings for the faces and [TypoWiki](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111165747/http:/typophile.com/wiki/start) links for the type designers. _Nice…_ :-)
